title: SODIAL(R) Magic Hair Bun Sponge Maker
description: * Tie your hair into a ponytail. High ponytail recommended for a classy and girly look.* Place ponytail into hair sponge.* Tighten hair sponge and pull down to perhaps the last quarter of your ponytail.* Start rolling the hair sponge up towards the top of your head.* Bend the ends of the hair sponge down to secure bun.* Move your hair so it covers the sponge.* Bobby pin the loose strands in, give it a puff of hairspray (optional) and you're all set!* Decorate with hair accessories (such as flowers or hairbands) if you like
